pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data for the Synbreed Package // Data sets for the 'synbreed' package with three data sets from cattle, maize and mice to illustrate the functions in the 'synbreed' R package. All data sets are stored in the gpData format introduced in the 'synbreed' package. This research was funded by the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF) within the AgroClustEr Synbreed - Synergistic plant and animal breeding (FKZ 0315528A).
